properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 8:09PM CST until January 19 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Lincoln IL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Illinois...

Embarras River at Ste. Marie affecting Crawford and Jasper Counties
Embarras River at Lawrenceville affecting Lawrence County

.The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil
moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Embarras River at Lawrenceville.
* Until Sunday January 19.
* At 745 PM Saturday the stage was 31.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 30 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 37 feet by
early Wednesday morning. The river will fall below flood stage
Sunday morning.
* Impact...At 37 feet...The road across Poteet Bridge floods. Some
houses are isolated.
properties.instruction:
If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternate
route. Turn around, don't drown.

Additional river and weather information is available at
www.weather.gov/ilx.
